overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto has a robust social media presence across multiple platforms, including Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, with a total of 3,580 followers. His content focuses on academic and research topics such as coordinated inauthentic behavior and computational methods, and it consistently engages a professional audience interested in disinformation and social media analysis.
